about_the_game:
Jiang Jun, who is 50 years old and has been unemployed for many years, is about to run out of his savings. He turns his attention to his parents, who were driven away by his outrageous behavior years ago. This game simulates the parasitic behavior of this jerk.

Features

  • Random Behaviors: Randomly engage in actions such as shopping, cleaning, cooking, asking for money, and more.
  • Choose Bonuses: Clean to earn coins? Get discounts on shopping? etc.
  • Based on Real Events: If there are similarities, please reflect on whether you have relatives who could make games.
  • Educational Meaning: This game has no educational meaning. Please do not learn from the protagonist in the game.
  • Be a Better Person: Huh? You became a master of relying on your parents? Come on!

name: Randomly Jerk Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Randomly Jerk Simulator" is a roguelite simulation game that uses a slot machine to simulate the parasitic behavior of a jerk who relies on his parents. This game does not contain any gambling behavior or cash transactions.
